com.netflix.genie.server.services
Interface ExecutionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenieExecutionServiceImpl
public interface ExecutionService

Interface for the Execution Service.
Implementations must be thread-safe.

successful response, or one with HTTP error code

getJobs

JobInfoResponse getJobs(java.lang.String jobID,
                        java.lang.String jobName,
                        java.lang.String userName,
                        java.lang.String jobType,
                        java.lang.String status,
                        java.lang.Integer limit,
                        java.lang.Integer page)
Get job info for given filter criteria.

Parameters:
jobID - id for job
jobName - name of job (can be a SQL-style pattern such as HIVE%)
userName - user who submitted job
jobType - type of job - possible types Type.JobType
status - status of job - possible types Type.JobStatus
limit - max number of jobs to return
page - page number for job
Returns:
successful response, or one with HTTP error code
